info.title: Cashflow (GPT Actions) – Strict
info.description: Cashflow Minimal service for transactions, categories, budgets, bills, balances, EF, breakdown planning, and snapshots. Shapes derived from service code.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of trailing days to sync

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by category id. Use null or _uncategorized to return only uncategorized transactions.

parameters.name: uncategorized
parameters.description: Filter by uncategorized state: true=only uncategorized, false=only categorized, omitted=no filter. Equivalent to category=null when true.

post.summary: Batch patch transactions (category, ignored, note, payee)

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of trailing days to include (inclusive of today)
